p: Caraway seed aqueous extract decreased the cholesterol and triglycerides in normal and streptozotocin diabetic rats. Six hours after oral administration of 20 mg/kg caraway seed aqueous extract, the plasma level of triglycerides and cholesterols of normal rats decreased. Oral single dose of caraway seed extract decreased the plasma cholesterol levels only in streptozotocin induced rats. No change was observed in plasma triglycerides concentration in caraway treated streptozotocin induced rats. Repeated oral administration of caraway extract for 15 days significantly reduced the plasma triglycerides in normal and streptozotocin rats [ 65].
